changed_products.title: 3W Chloe Fluted Marker Light, CCT Mini Downlight, Niche/Alcove/Soffit Light Copper (Non Dimmable Driver Included) Copper Bezel / *Single Colour (Very

description:
Please note these finishes are manufactured to order and have a 3–5 day lead time. As these items are made to order, they are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

  

 This fitting is supplied with a pre-wired inline waterproof driver that fits through the cutout hole for easy installation.

 The Premium 3W Chloe Fluted Marker Light / Mini Downlight in Copper finish features an inline CCT colour-switchable connector, allowing you to select between Warm White (2800K), Cool White (4000K), and Daylight (6000K). Designed with a fluted anti-glare bezel and faceted lens, this stylish IP44-rated fitting offers soft, glare-free illumination — a great MR11 alternative for modern interiors.

 Key Features:

  
 *  Power: 3W

  
 *  Light Output: 300 lumens

  
 *  Colour Temperature: Switchable (2800K / 4000K / 6000K)

  
 *  Beam Angle: 30° (low-glare fluted design)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP44 – suitable for indoor use

  
 *  Bezel Finish: Copper

  
 *  Driver: Pre-wired inline waterproof driver (fits through cutout hole)

  
 *  Dimmable option available (requires compatible dimmable driver)

   Applications:
Perfect for kitchens (as plinth lights), receptions, meeting rooms, entrance foyers, niches, soffits, and cabinet lighting.

 Dimensions:

  
 *  Cutout: Ø37mm

  
 *  Height: 34mm

  
 *  Front Bezel: Ø45mm

   Installation Notes:
The inline waterproof driver fits easily through the cutout hole for convenient setup.
For use in humid or semi-outdoor areas, the driver must be housed in a waterproof enclosure.
To enable dimming, replace the supplied driver with a compatible dimmable driver.
Installation should be carried out by a qualified professional.

changed_products.title: 18W IP54 LED Round Downlight Colour Switchable 3K/4K/6K, Recessed Ceiling Panel, 200mm Cutout, 1800 Lumen 1pc - Uno Lighting

title: 18W IP54 LED Round Downlight €“ Colour Switchable 3K/4K/6K, Recessed Ceiling Panel, 200mm Cutout, 1800 Lumen 1pc - Uno Lighting
18W IP54 LED Round Downlight Colour Switchable 3K/4K/6K, Recessed Ceiling Panel, 200mm Cutout, 1800 Lumen 1pc - Uno Lighting
description:
18W Ultra-Thin LED Round Panel / Downlight (9mm Profile, Colour Switchable)

 This ultra-slim 18W LED panel features a CCT colour-changing function controlled by a dip switch on the back, allowing you to select from three colour temperatures:

  
 *  Warm White (3000K)

  
 *  Cool White (4000K)

  
 *  Daylight (6000K)

   Perfect for: receptions, entrances, foyers, corridors, stairwells, and offices.

 Specifications:

  
 *  Wattage: 18W

  
 *  IP Rating: IP54

  
 *  Output Voltage: 36-54V

  
 *  Luminous Efficacy: 100 lm/W

  
 *  Mounting: Recessed

  
 *  Dimensions: 223mm x 9mm

  
 *  Cut-out: 200mm

  
 *  Options: Emergency pack & dimmable driver available

   Important: Do not adjust the colour temperature (via the dip switch) while the fitting is powered on. Doing so may cause premature failure.

description_changes.title: 3W Chloe Fluted Marker Light, CCT Mini Downlight, Niche/Alcove/Soffit Light Copper (Non Dimmable Driver Included) Copper Bezel / *Single Colour (Very

description:
Please note these finishes are manufactured to order and have a 3–5 day lead time. As these items are made to order, they are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

  

 This fitting is supplied with a pre-wired inline waterproof driver that fits through the cutout hole for easy installation.

 The Premium 3W Chloe Fluted Marker Light / Mini Downlight in Copper finish features an inline CCT colour-switchable connector, allowing you to select between Warm White (2800K), Cool White (4000K), and Daylight (6000K). Designed with a fluted anti-glare bezel and faceted lens, this stylish IP44-rated fitting offers soft, glare-free illumination — a great MR11 alternative for modern interiors.

 Key Features:

  
 *  Power: 3W

  
 *  Light Output: 300 lumens

  
 *  Colour Temperature: Switchable (2800K / 4000K / 6000K)

  
 *  Beam Angle: 30° (low-glare fluted design)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP44 – suitable for indoor use

  
 *  Bezel Finish: Copper

  
 *  Driver: Pre-wired inline waterproof driver (fits through cutout hole)

  
 *  Dimmable option available (requires compatible dimmable driver)

   Applications:
Perfect for kitchens (as plinth lights), receptions, meeting rooms, entrance foyers, niches, soffits, and cabinet lighting.

 Dimensions:

  
 *  Cutout: Ø37mm

  
 *  Height: 34mm

  
 *  Front Bezel: Ø45mm

   Installation Notes:
The inline waterproof driver fits easily through the cutout hole for convenient setup.
For use in humid or semi-outdoor areas, the driver must be housed in a waterproof enclosure.
To enable dimming, replace the supplied driver with a compatible dimmable driver.
Installation should be carried out by a qualified professional.
